name: Medieval Towns
description: A multiplayer game in medieval setting about survival, diplomacy, building of towns and conquests. Try to survive in wild nature, gather resources, create or join clan, build town and fight for glory or resources!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel I3 or equal Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 2GB or equal DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
